original_text: it's never a good sign when a film's star spends the entirety of the film in a coma . it's a worse sign when you begin to envy her condition .
generated_text:
1. "The plot is so dull, I found myself wishing the main character would just stay asleep forever."
2. "I've seen more exciting things in a sleepy museum exhibit. This film is a snooze fest."
3. "The only thing more boring than the movie is the main character's coma. At least she's not awake to suffer through this drivel."
4. "I was so disinterested in the story, I started to hope the protagonist would just stay in her vegetative state forever."
